@swift9900: The best program I've found is "Free Video Converter" totally free and easy to use. Just make sure you set the aspect ratio correctly and also that the resolution is not set too high for your DVD player or other player. My dad's normal DVD player can only accept files that are a max res of 720x??? In the "Output Format" you must set it to AVI format and then in the "Codec"  tab you select DIVX codec, then it should work.
